Understate: The claim may understate the fact that not all COVID-19 victims in New York City are being buried in mass graves on Hart Island.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the images show COVID-19 victims being buried in mass graves, without considering alternative explanations or the historical use of Hart Island as a public cemetery.
Lack enough support: The claim may lack enough support to conclusively prove that the images show COVID-19 victims being buried in mass graves.
